name: Rithika
Reason: I trust this message finds you well. I am writing to inform you that I am unwell and have been diagnosed with a fever. As a result, I am unable to perform my duties effectively and believe it is in the best interest of the team and the company for me to take a temporary leave of absence.

name: Vincy
Reason: I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to request leave from work on 12.02.2024 due to personal reasons that require my presence at the bank.
